Subjects: Christ, complaint to man; laments; sermons, verse in
_description: Christ laments unfaithful mankind, his love — three couplets in a Latin sermon Luna mutatur

CULIi38.Transcription:
Ich ave a loue vntreweÞat myn herte woÞat makeȝ
                    me of reufol heweLato to bedde goSore me may reweÞat eure hi
                    louede hire so
